H0.text: How many 'Pockets' would you find on a pool table. 4

H1.text: How many 'Pockets' would you find on a pool table. 8

H2.text: How many 'Pockets' would you find on a pool table. 2

H3.text: How many 'Pockets' would you find on a pool table. 6

A4.text: A pool table has six pockets, one at each corner and one at the midpoint of each longer side.
